Replace.Text: Nile Divine Realm-Jiangyu Shuanghua
Niro
Osiris (Jiangyu picks up flowers)
Osiris (Bird Heart)
Even if you repeat hundreds or thousands of times of training, you can learn something new
Netherworld Blade

Except for having Soul Feather Osiris Leadership skills, upgraded units will not end their turn. All units ignore the terrain and the [ICON_Movement] movement penalty across rivers. After attacking, they can move. There is no movement power consumption when boarding and disembarking. After studying {LOC_TECH_SHIPBUILDING_NAME}, all units have the ability to enter coastal and ocean cells. The expansion rate of all urban borders has increased by 1000%. When you have ancient woods, all cities have cells +2[ICON_Food]food +2[ICON_Faith]faith +2[ICON_Gold] gold coins. When you have a shelter building, all cities have cells +2[ICON_Production] productivity +2[ICON_Science] technology value +2[ICON_Culture] culture value. Territory espionage - level 4. When the offensive spy mission is successful, you will get 1000% of the [ICON_Gold] gold coins and [ICON_Faith] belief values ​​in the target city. The time for spies to complete all tasks is reduced by 100% and it does not take time to deploy in enemy cities. The effect of inciting riots is increased by 100. {LOC_BUILDING_SHRINE_NAME}+1 spy capacity. All military policy slots in the current regime have been converted to wildcard slots, with two or more [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture] masterpiece slots and buildings are automatically subjected to [ICON_ThemeBonus_Active], palace +2 [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture] masterpiece slots, monument +10 [ICON_VisLimited] diplomatic support, all cities are established with an additional downtown building (ancient times were monuments)
Seeing that everyone is working hard, I also need to provide them with better support - Osiris
Gentle and kind
Have a good impression of all civilizations you have met
OK, if I need to do anything, please speak
I can't agree to this request yet, sorry
I want to cooperate with you, are you willing to accept it?
I will provide you with better support
Did I drag you down?
I won't let you hurt anyone
This is the last thing I can do for you
Please come in ~
Sorry, it's not the time yet
These are some cakes and milk teas that are perfect for afternoon tea time
What did Osiris do wrong?
You've caused a lot of trouble for everyone
Hello, stranger, my name is Osiris, I'm glad to know you
Welcome to visit our city, Ain Sophie is a very beautiful city
The scenery in a foreign country is so beautiful
Can you tell me where you came from... Let's talk to each other
It's tea time, should I have some cake with me?
My fellow amendmentists report that many of your army appear on the border, which is to...
That's right
Your expansion steps have hindered Ain Sophie's development
(sigh)
Why did your informant appear in Ain Sophie?
This is very rude behavior
I don't understand what your believers say, can you let them leave?
Why do you need this...
There are obviously... many things to do...
Happy cooperation
Happy cooperation
Happy cooperation
It doesn't matter, next time
It doesn't matter, next time
It doesn't matter, next time
Haha (smile)
Friendly meeting with Osiris
